list.headline: Adventures!
list.leftTextBlock: using DnCreate's adventure mode you have the ability to connect with your friends under your DM and set into adventure.

list.headline: Lead Adventure
list.leftTextBlock: As the DM you can initiate a new adventure and invite your players.
list.rightTextBlock: Once your players have joined you will have partial access to their character sheets and the ability to view their information instantly!

list.headline: Join Adventure
list.leftTextBlock: After your DM hosts a new adventure in DnCreate he will be able to invite you using the adventure's identifier number.
list.rightTextBlock: Once you join the adventure you will have the ability to view your team mates names and view party quests.

list.headline: Quest System
list.leftTextBlock: As the DM you have the ability to issue quests to your players
list.rightTextBlock: Once you issue a quest, your players will have the ability to view and track it!

list.headline: Ready For Adventure?
list.leftTextBlock: We hope you enjoy Adventure mode
list.rightTextBlock: Go, explore the vast universe of imagination!
